The vniuersall principle the common iustice of the world, and the royall law of love : deliuered in a sermon at the assises in Dorchester, the 23. day of Iuly, anno Dom. 1629 / by I.M. ... Mayo, John K.
[23] p.
Printed for Iohn Smithuuike, London : 1630.
Dedication signed: Iohn Mayo. Signatures: A-C⁴ (last page blank). Reproduction of original in the British Library.
